org.biopcd.widgets

Class WidgetTransferHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.TransferHandler
      • org.biopcd.widgets.WidgetTransferHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.dnd.DragSourceMotionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class WidgetTransferHandler
extends javax.swing.TransferHandler
implements java.awt.dnd.DragSourceMotionListener
    Widget transfer handler - used for dragging and dropping Widgets Acknowledgement - Bryan E. Smith - bryanesmith@gmail.com Thanks for providing sample Java drag&drop code that helped me with writing the underlying framework
    Author:
    Graham Alvare, Brian Fristensky
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createTransferable

        public java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable createTransferable(javax.swing.JComponent cmp)

        This creates the Transferable object. In our case, RandomDragAndDropPanel implements Transferable, so this requires only a type cast.

        Overrides:
        createTransferable in class javax.swing.TransferHandler
        Parameters:
        cmp - The component to make transferable.
        Returns:

      • getSourceActions

        public int getSourceActions(javax.swing.JComponent cmp)

        This is queried to see whether the component can be copied, moved, both or neither. We are only concerned with copying.

        Overrides:
        getSourceActions in class javax.swing.TransferHandler
        Parameters:
        cmp - The component to get source actions for.
        Returns:
        The source action integer for the component.
